Examples
========

Comprehensive examples demonstrating SPROCLIB capabilities across different applications.

Overview
--------

This section provides practical examples of using SPROCLIB for various process
control and optimization tasks.

.. toctree::
   :maxdepth: 2

   examples/unit_operations/index

Getting Started Examples
-----------------------

Basic examples for new users:

* Simple tank control
* Basic pump systems  
* Elementary reactor modeling

Intermediate Examples
--------------------

More complex applications:

* Multi-unit process control
* Optimization workflows
* System identification

Advanced Examples
----------------

Sophisticated implementations:

* Plant-wide control systems
* Economic optimization
* Predictive control

.. note::
   Additional examples are continuously being added. Check back regularly for
   new content or contribute your own examples to the project.
